ygData.subject: Re: Communications Established
ygData.msgSnippet: The Iron Fist cut through the ocean waves. The massive ship barely rolling in the slight swell. Hell Beast is here, Panzertron said to the figure sitting

From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>

 The Iron Fist cut through the ocean waves. The
massive ship barely rolling in the slight swell.
  
  "Hell Beast is here," Panzertron said to the figure
sitting behind the desk.

  "He's attempted to contact us, as has a group
identifing themselves as the Alliance," Panzertron
reported.

  The figure nodded," Invite the Alliance leader and
Hell Beast to the ship. Each comes alone. We'll let
them explain themselves to us. If this Alliance is
worth joining we will. We'll also give Hell Beast the
chance to plea his case before we decide his fate."


 "Yes sir," Panzertron said departing the private
chambers.

-OOC- If you respond about the Militrons and Iron
Fist, please use a title. Neo Beast wars five billion
times over and over again isnt creative. 
thnx
